GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 03-37.2N 006-16.4E AT 080920Z MAY.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS
   POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
   PHONE: 603 2031 0014, 603 2078 5763,
   FAX: 603 2078 5769,
   E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG, PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG
   AND TO MDAT-GOGC, PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 151742Z MAY 18.
